translated: This is because we accept that phenomena and nonphenomena are the nature of the specific actions of body, speech, and mind.‚Äù

original: rgyu phan 'dogs pa tshogs pa tsam la tha snyad du byed pa po nyid du khas blangs pas /
analyzed: rgyu phan 'dogs pa tshogs pa tsam la tha snyad du byed pa po nyid du khas blangs pas /
translated: We accept that the mere collection of causes and benefits is conventionally the agent.

original: de la ltos pa nyid kyi chos dang chos ma yin pa dag las kyi sgrar brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la ltos pa nyid kyi chos dang chos ma yin pa dag las kyi sgrar brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Since phenomena and nonphenomena depend on that, they are called ‚Äúactions.‚Äù

original: byed pa po med na de la ltos pa'i las mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byed pa po med na de la ltos pa'i las mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: If there is no agent, the action that depends on it is not established.

original: chos dang chos yin pa la sogs pa dag med pa'i skyon gyis mi gnod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos dang chos yin pa la sogs pa dag med pa'i skyon gyis mi gnod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the error of the nonexistence of phenomena and nonphenomena and so on is not avoided.

original: ltos pa'i rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa'i rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the reasoning of dependence is not tenable.

original: de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: In this way, as has been explained,

original: chos dang chos min med na ni //
analyzed: chos dang chos min med na ni //
translated: If there were no virtue and vice,

original: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu med //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu med //
translated: then the effects arising from them would not exist.

original: chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med na de dag las byung ba'i 'bras bu lha dang mi dang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi 'gro ba dag tu lus dang dbang po dang longs spyod 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'grub pa dag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin pa dag med na de dag las byung ba'i 'bras bu lha dang mi dang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi 'gro ba dag tu lus dang dbang po dang longs spyod 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i bdag nyid 'grub pa dag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there were no virtue and vice, then the effects arising from them, the bodies, faculties, and resources of gods, humans, hell-beings, animals, and ghosts, which are desired and undesired, would not exist.üîΩIf there were no effects,

original: de ltar / 'bras bu med na thar pa dang // mtho ris 'gyur ba'i lam mi 'thad //
analyzed: de ltar / 'bras bu med na thar pa dang // mtho ris 'gyur ba'i lam mi 'thad //
translated: the path to liberation and heaven would be untenable.üîΩAll actions

original: bya ba dag ni thams cad kyang //üîΩdon med nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bya ba dag ni thams cad kyang // don med nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
translated: would be pointless.üîΩIf there were no effects, then the path to liberation, which is the path to heaven, would be untenable.

original: 'bras bu med na thal bar 'gyur ba'i lam rnal 'byor pa dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i don du yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du btang ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yang mi 'thad par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'bras bu med na thal bar 'gyur ba'i lam rnal 'byor pa dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i don du yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du btang ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yang mi 'thad par 'gyur la /
translated: If there were no effects, then the cultivation of the eightfold noble path preceded by the correct view would be untenable as the path to nirvana for yogis.

original: mtho ris su 'gyur ba'i lam tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mngon par brtson pa yang mi 'thad par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mtho ris su 'gyur ba'i lam tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mngon par brtson pa yang mi 'thad par 'gyur zhing /
translated: It would be untenable to take up the path of perfect discipline that leads to the higher realms, to strive for meditative concentration and meditative attainment,

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde'i phyir de ltar byed pa po ma nyin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa dang / las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba yin par rtog pa la gnod pa chen po de @117a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro // de'i phyir de ltar byed pa po ma nyin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa dang / las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba yin par rtog pa la gnod pa chen po de @117a * //
translated: and it would follow that all mundane and supramundane activities would be pointless.

original: dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzlog dka' bar rig nas byed pa po dang las dag ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzlog dka' bar rig nas byed pa po dang las dag ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, when one understands that such a great and difficult-to-reverse harm would occur in the conception of an unreal agent performing an unreal action and an unreal action being performed by an unreal agent, one should accept that agent and action are indeed dependent.

original: de ltar gtan tshigs kha na ma tho ba med pa ji skad bstan pa de yod pa'i phyir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa /
analyzed: de ltar gtan tshigs kha na ma tho ba med pa ji skad bstan pa de yod pa'i phyir byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa /
translated: Since there is such a faultless reason as has been taught, an unreal agent does not perform an unreal action.

original: las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa dang ; las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de mi 'thad par bstan to //
analyzed: las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa dang ; las ma yin par gyur pa byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba yin par sgrub pa'i phyogs de mi 'thad par bstan to //
translated: The position that the agent of an unreal action and the action of an unreal agent are established is untenable.

original: rnam grangs kyi tshul smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi tshul smra ba dag na re /
translated: The Enumerators say:

original: rnam grangs las byed pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa las yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa byed pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam grangs las byed pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa las yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa byed pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: There is no error because the agent of an existent or nonexistent action performs an existent or nonexistent action.

original: 'dir bshad pa /üîΩbyed pa por gyur ma gyur pa //üîΩgyur ma gyur de mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / byed pa por gyur ma gyur pa // gyur ma gyur de mi byed do //
translated: Here we say:üîΩAn existent or nonexistent agent

original: yin dang ma yin gyur pa ni //
analyzed: yin dang ma yin gyur pa ni //
translated: Does not perform an existent or nonexistent action.üîΩHow could an existent and nonexistent actionüîΩBe one because they are mutually exclusive?

original: phan tshun 'gal bas ga la gcig /'di ltar yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa ni phan tshun 'gal bas gcig la gcig dus gcig tu mi 'thad do //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal bas ga la gcig /'di ltar yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa ni phan tshun 'gal bas gcig la gcig dus gcig tu mi 'thad do //
translated: Thus, an existent and nonexistent action are mutually exclusive and it is untenable that they are one.

original: gal te yin na ni ji ltar ma yin par 'gyur ci ste ma yin na ni ji ltar yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yin na ni ji ltar ma yin par 'gyur ci ste ma yin na ni ji ltar yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is existent, how could it be nonexistent? If it is nonexistent, how could it be existent?

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten na me la tsha ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / grang ba'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten na me la tsha ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / grang ba'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as in the world, the essence of fire is not observed as cold, and the essence of water is not observed as hot.

original: ci ste rdzas kyi ngo bo nyid du yod pa'i phyir yin par gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: ci ste rdzas kyi ngo bo nyid du yod pa'i phyir yin par gyur pa yin la /
translated: But if it is said that it is because it exists as the essence of substance,

original: bya ba dang byed pa'i sngon rol na byed pa po nyid du med pa'i phyir ma yin par gyur pa yang yin pas de ltar ltos pa'i dbang gis gcig la yang dus gcig na gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na //
analyzed: bya ba dang byed pa'i sngon rol na byed pa po nyid du med pa'i phyir ma yin par gyur pa yang yin pas de ltar ltos pa'i dbang gis gcig la yang dus gcig na gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na //
translated: then it is not because it does not exist as an agent prior to action and instrument. Thus, because it exists as both in one at the same time, depending on perspective, there is no fault.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: ltos pa'i nges pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pas bkag pa'i phyir skyon med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa'i nges pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pas bkag pa'i phyir skyon med pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the certainty of dependence is refuted, and because it is refuted by the inference taught in both positions, it is not faultless.

original: gal te mchod sbyin ni byed pa po nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: gal te mchod sbyin ni byed pa po nyid kyang yin la /
translated: If it is said that the sacrificer is both an agentüîΩand not an agent,

original: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid kyang yin pas /
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid kyang yin pas /
translated: then it is not so.

original: dpe med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no example, it is not harmed by inference.

original: lhas byin gyi rgyud la mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i cha dang / mchod sbyin gyi bya ba ma yin par gyur pa'i char bsgrub pa nyid dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: lhas byin gyi rgyud la mchod sbyin byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa'i cha dang / mchod sbyin gyi bya ba ma yin par gyur pa'i char bsgrub pa nyid dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no error, because the part of Devadatta that is not an agent of sacrifice and the part of the object that is not the object of sacrifice are accepted as the example.

original: rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig phyogs mthun pa la brten pa'i byed pa po dang las rnam par bzhag pa dag don dam pa la ma yin pas rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs @117b kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar re zhig phyogs mthun pa la brten pa'i byed pa po dang las rnam par bzhag pa dag don dam pa la ma yin pas rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs @117b kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the agent and action posited in dependence on a homogeneous collection are not ultimate, and therefore the meaning of the reason stated in the first chapter is not established.

original: gal te byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa byed cing /
analyzed: gal te byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa byed cing /
translated: But if an agent that exists makes an object that does not exist,

original: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa yang las yin par gyur par byed pas skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa yang las yin par gyur par byed pas skyon med do zhe na /
translated: and if an agent that does not exist makes an object that exists, there is no error.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
translated: The agent and action

original: gyur pa ma gyur mi byed de //
analyzed: gyur pa ma gyur mi byed de //
translated: That which is a real agent does not perform a real action.

original: ma gyur pa yang gyur mi byed //
analyzed: ma gyur pa yang gyur mi byed //
translated: That which is a non-agent does not perform a non-action.

original: gang gis ci zhig mi byed ce na /
analyzed: gang gis ci zhig mi byed ce na /
translated: What is it that does not perform what?

original: byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed la /
analyzed: byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur pa mi byed la /
translated: That which is a real agent does not perform a non-action.

original: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed do //
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed do //
translated: That which is a non-agent does not perform a real action.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / 'dir yang skyon der thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'dir yang skyon der thal bar 'gyur //
translated: Because the same error would ensue here.

original: yin par gyur pa dang / ma yin par gyur pa'i phyogs su bstan pa'i skyon de dag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin par gyur pa dang / ma yin par gyur pa'i phyogs su bstan pa'i skyon de dag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The same errors that were shown to ensue for the positions of reality and unreality would ensue here.

original: don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur ba mi byed la /
analyzed: don dam par byed pa po yin par gyur pa las ma yin par gyur ba mi byed la /
translated: In the ultimate sense, that which is a real agent does not perform a non-action.üîΩThat which is a non-agent does not perform a real action.

original: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed do zhes dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin par gyur pa las yin par gyur pa mi byed do zhes dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
translated: This is the only difference in the thesis.

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The remaining members of the syllogism are the same as before.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
translated: An agent and action

original: gyur dang bcas pa ma gyur dang // gyur ma gyur pa mi byed de //
analyzed: gyur dang bcas pa ma gyur dang // gyur ma gyur pa mi byed de //
translated: And the transforming and non-transforming do not create the non-transforming.

original: gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro //
translated: The reason has been explained above.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag ni //
translated: The agent and actionüîΩDo not create the non-transforming and transforming,

original: ma gyur ba ni gyur bcas dang // gyur ma gyur pa mi byed do //
analyzed: ma gyur ba ni gyur bcas dang // gyur ma gyur pa mi byed do //
translated: And the transforming and non-transforming do not create the transforming and non-transforming.

original: gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gong du bstan phyir ro //
translated: The reason has been explained above.

original: de bzhin du /üîΩbyed pa por gyur ma gyur ni //
analyzed: de bzhin du / byed pa por gyur ma gyur ni //
translated: Similarly,üîΩThe transforming and non-transforming agent

original: las su gyur dang ma gyur pa //
analyzed: las su gyur dang ma gyur pa //
translated: Does not create the transforming and non-transforming action.

original: mi byed 'dir yang gtan tshigs ni //
analyzed: mi byed 'dir yang gtan tshigs ni //
translated: Here also, the reason

original: gong du bstan pas shes par bya //
analyzed: gong du bstan pas shes par bya //
translated: Should be understood from what was explained above.

original: 'dir yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
analyzed: 'dir yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
translated: Here, only the thesis is different.

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The remaining parts of the syllogism are the same as before.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar brtags na //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar brtags na //
translated: Since this is how it is analyzed,

original: byed po las la brten byas shing //
analyzed: byed po las la brten byas shing //
translated: The agent depends on the action,

original: las kyang byed po de nyid la //
analyzed: las kyang byed po de nyid la //
translated: And the action also

original: brten nas 'byung ba de yi phyir //
analyzed: brten nas 'byung ba de yi phyir //
translated: Arises in dependence on that agent.

original: byed pa po dang las nyid la byed pa po dang las kyi rgyu yod pa ni tha snyad par phan tshun ltos pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: byed pa po dang las nyid la byed pa po dang las kyi rgyu yod pa ni tha snyad par phan tshun ltos pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: The cause of the agent and action is merely their mutual dependence in conventional terms.

original: de ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa 'grub pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa 'grub pa'i rgyu ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: Apart from that, no other cause of their establishment is seen.

original: de lta bas na rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi lan gdab dka' ba dang / dpe'i skyon yod pa dang / gtan tshigs gzhan du rtog na yang don 'gal ba nyid @118a * //üîΩdu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi lan gdab dka' ba dang / dpe'i skyon yod pa dang / gtan tshigs gzhan du rtog na yang don 'gal ba nyid @118a * // du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is difficult to respond to the argument stated in the first chapter by saying that its point is not established, and the example has a fault, and if the argument is conceived differently, then it is contradictory.

original: gang dag don dam par phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gang dag don dam par phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Those who say that the aggregates, elements, and sense bases exist ultimately

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: because the Transcendent Lord said that there is the appropriator and that which is to be appropriated should be refuted by the following statements, which are similar in meaning:

original: de bzhin nyer len shes par bya ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dra bar bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyer len shes par bya ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dra bar bstan par bya ste /
translated: The appropriator should be understood in the same way.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i 'bad pas nye bar bstan pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa'i 'bad pas nye bar bstan pa bzhin du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as‚Äù means just as it has been taught.

original: nyer len ces bya ba ni nye bar len pa ste /
analyzed: nyer len ces bya ba ni nye bar len pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Appropriation‚Äù means appropriation.

original: dngos po'i rkyen du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i rkyen du blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be seen as a condition of entities.

original: nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because the appropriator and the appropriated are mutually dependent.

original: gang la dngos po yod pa de la byed pa po du ma yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la dngos po yod pa de la byed pa po du ma yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because where there is an entity, there is a multiplicity of agents.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i 'bad pa ni ji ltar byed pa po las la brten cing las kyang byed pa po la brten nas 'byung ba de bzhin du nye bar len pa po yang nye bar blang ba la brten nas nye bar blang ba yang nye bar len pa
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i 'bad pa ni ji ltar byed pa po las la brten cing las kyang byed pa po la brten nas 'byung ba de bzhin du nye bar len pa po yang nye bar blang ba la brten nas nye bar blang ba yang nye bar len pa
translated: Just as the agent arises in dependence on the action and the action arises in dependence on the agent, in the same way, the appropriator arises in dependence on the appropriated and the appropriated arises in dependence on the appropriator.

original: po la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur bas nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag gi nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba nyid ni don dam pa pa ma yin no //
analyzed: po la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur bas nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag gi nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba nyid ni don dam pa pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the status of the appropriator and the appropriated is not ultimate.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: las dang byed po bsal phyir ro //
analyzed: las dang byed po bsal phyir ro //
translated: Because the agent and action are refuted.

original: bsal zhes byas pa ni bkag pa'o //
analyzed: bsal zhes byas pa ni bkag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúRefuted‚Äù means negated.

original: phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don te /
analyzed: phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause‚Äù means the reason.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar byed pa po dang las dag bsal ba bstan pa de nyid kyis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag kyang bsal bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar byed pa po dang las dag bsal ba bstan pa de nyid kyis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag kyang bsal bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Since the agent and action are thus refuted, the appropriator and the appropriated should be understood as also refuted.

original: de la phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de la phyogs tsam zhig bstan par bya ste /
translated: Here, we will teach just a portion of that.

original: don dam par nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa de'i sgrar brjod pa dag len par mi byed par gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: don dam par nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa de'i sgrar brjod pa dag len par mi byed par gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Ultimately, the appropriator, Devadatta, who is not an appropriator, does not appropriate the appropriated, the words that are expressed, because he is not apprehended.

original: nye bar blang ba la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin bzhin no //
analyzed: nye bar blang ba la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin bzhin no //
translated: Because he depends on the appropriated, like a sacrifice.

original: don dam pa nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lha sbyin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len par mi byed pa dang / nye bar len pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba yin pa dang /
analyzed: don dam pa nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lha sbyin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len par mi byed pa dang / nye bar len pa po yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba nye bar blang ba yin pa dang /
translated: In the same way, ultimately, the appropriator Devadatta, who is not an appropriator, does not appropriate that which is not to be appropriated, and Devadatta, who is and is not an appropriator, does not appropriate that which is and is not to be appropriated.

original: ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len par mi byed de zhes bya ba dag la yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
analyzed: ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len par mi byed de zhes bya ba dag la yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
translated: In these two cases, the thesis is different,

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
translated: but the remaining parts of the syllogism are the same as before.

original: de bzhin du don dam par nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa yang nye bar @118b len pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa yang nye bar @118b len pa po yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, ultimately, that which is to be appropriated is not the appropriated aggregates of Devadatta, who is an appropriator,

original: nye bar len pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi nye bar blang bar gyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po la ltos pa'i phyir dper na mchod sbyin gyi rgyud kyi nye bar blang bar gyur pa bzhin no //
translated: because it depends on the appropriator, just like the appropriated aggregates of Yaj√±adatta.

original: don dam par nye bar blang ba ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin pa dang / nye bar blang ba yin pa dang / ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len pa po yin pa dang /
analyzed: don dam par nye bar blang ba ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len pa po ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin pa dang / nye bar blang ba yin pa dang / ma yin par gyur pa nye bar len pa po yin pa dang /
translated: Ultimately, the appropriator who is not an appropriator, Devadatta, is not an appropriator, nor is he an appropriator who is not an appropriator.

original: ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin te zhes bya ba dag la yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
analyzed: ma yin par gyur pa lhas byin zhes bya ba'i nye bar blang ba ma yin te zhes bya ba dag la yang dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
translated: The appropriator who is not an appropriator, Devadatta, is not an appropriator, nor is he an appropriator who is not an appropriator.

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni rgyas par snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The remainder of the parts of the proof are the same as before.

original: de bzhin du phyogs mi mthun pa dag la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyogs mi mthun pa dag la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The reverse of this should also be stated.

original: nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa la sogs pa dag don dam par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba yin par gyur pa la sogs pa dag don dam par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appropriator and the appropriated, etc., are not ultimately established.

original: 'dir yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pas med pa dang / gtan tshigs gzhan du rtog na yang don 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / dpe bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang mi ldan pas med pa dang / gtan tshigs gzhan du rtog na yang don 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the meaning of the reason is not established, the example is not established, and the reason is not concomitant with the predicate of the probandum, and if the reason is conceived to be different, then the meaning is contradictory.üîΩJust as ultimately the appropriator and that appropriated are refuted by the agent and object,

original: ji ltar don dam par byed pa po dang las dag gis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag bsal ba de bzhin du /üîΩbyed pa po dang las dag gis //
analyzed: ji ltar don dam par byed pa po dang las dag gis nye bar len pa po dang / nye bar blang ba dag bsal ba de bzhin du / byed pa po dang las dag gis //
translated: so too

original: dngos po lhag ma shes par bya //
analyzed: dngos po lhag ma shes par bya //
translated: the remaining things should be understood by the agent and object.

original: rang dang gzhan la grags pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / yon tan dang / yon tan can dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / yan lag dang / yan lag can la sogs pa /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan la grags pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / yon tan dang / yon tan can dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / yan lag dang / yan lag can la sogs pa /
translated: The remaining things, such as cause and effect, quality and possessor of quality, characteristic and basis of characteristic, part and whole, and so on, which are renowned to our own and other schools,

original: dngos po lhag ma rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po lhag ma rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
translated: should be understood.

original: rgyu yang 'bras bu la brten cing 'bras bu yang rgyu la brten nas 'grub pa la sogs pa tha snyad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu yang 'bras bu la brten cing 'bras bu yang rgyu la brten nas 'grub pa la sogs pa tha snyad pa yin gyi /
translated: Cause is dependent on effect and effect is established in dependence on cause and so on are conventions.

original: don dam pa pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not ultimate.

original: gang dag rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dag gi don dam pa ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la mngon par zhen pa de dag gi mngon par zhen pa'i zug rngu dag bsal bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: gang dag rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dag gi don dam pa ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la mngon par zhen pa de dag gi mngon par zhen pa'i zug rngu dag bsal bar 'dod pas /
translated: Those who are attached to the nature of ultimate cause and effect, etc.,

original: slob dpon gyis bka' stsal ba'i lung khas blangs nas /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bka' stsal ba'i lung khas blangs nas /
translated: the master, having accepted the scriptures,

original: cung zad dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: cung zad dpyad par bya'o //
translated: will analyze them a little.

original: don dam par 'o ma yin par gyur pa ni zho yin par gyur pa mi byed de /
analyzed: don dam par 'o ma yin par gyur pa ni zho yin par gyur pa mi byed de /
translated: In the ultimate, that which is milk does not make that which is yogurt,

original: 'bras bu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na rgyu spun dag bzhin no //üîΩgal te mthong ba dang grags pa'i gnod @119a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na rgyu spun dag bzhin no // gal te mthong ba dang grags pa'i gnod @119a * //
translated: because it depends on the effect, like the cause, the two pieces of cloth.

original: pas gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: pas gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is undermined by what is seen and renowned,

original: dam bcas pa khyad par can byas pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: dam bcas pa khyad par can byas pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: then the fault is not ours, because we have made a special assertion.

original: yang na don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i 'o ma ni /
analyzed: yang na don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i 'o ma ni /
translated: Or, that which is milk, which is asserted to be ultimate,

original: bsams pa'i zho'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: bsams pa'i zho'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: is not the cause of the intended yogurt,üîΩbecause it is not the cause of the intended yogurt, like the cause of curd.

original: 'o ma yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa'i 'o ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'o ma yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa'i 'o ma bzhin no //
translated: because it is milk, like milk from another cow.

original: de bzhin du don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i zho ni 'o ma'i rgyu can ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i zho ni 'o ma'i rgyu can ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, yogurt that is asserted to be ultimately existent is not the cause of milk,

original: 'o ma la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o ma la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: because it depends on milk,

original: dper na de las gzhan pa'i zho bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na de las gzhan pa'i zho bzhin no //
translated: like yogurt from another cow.

original: yang na don dam par zho ni 'o ma'i rgyu can ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na don dam par zho ni 'o ma'i rgyu can ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: Or, yogurt should be understood to be not the cause of milk, ultimately,

original: rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na snam bu bzhin na //
analyzed: rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na snam bu bzhin na //
translated: because it depends on a cause, like a cloth.

original: 'dir kha cig na re don dam par 'o ma ni zho mi byed de zhes dam bcas pa de'i don /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig na re don dam par 'o ma ni zho mi byed de zhes dam bcas pa de'i don /
translated: Here, someone says: The meaning of the thesis ‚Äúultimately, milk does not produce yogurt‚Äù

original: gal te tha snyad du byed pa yin na ni dpe med pa dang / phyogs snga ma la gnod do //
analyzed: gal te tha snyad du byed pa yin na ni dpe med pa dang / phyogs snga ma la gnod do //
translated: if it is taken conventionally, there is no example and the opponent‚Äôs position is undermined.

original: ci ste rang gi bya ba mi byed pa nyid yin na ni de lta na yang dpe med pa dang / ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: ci ste rang gi bya ba mi byed pa nyid yin na ni de lta na yang dpe med pa dang / ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: But if it is taken as not performing its own function, then also in that case there is no example and it is not established.

original: thams cad kyang bya ba so sor nges pa byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang bya ba so sor nges pa byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Because everything performs its own function.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: This is not good.

original: brtag pa snga ma ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtag pa snga ma ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The former hypothesis is unacceptable.

original: brtag pa phyi ma la yang rgyu spun la sogs pa zho'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid dang / snam bu la sogs pa 'o ma'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid grub pa dag dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dpe med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: brtag pa phyi ma la yang rgyu spun la sogs pa zho'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid dang / snam bu la sogs pa 'o ma'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid grub pa dag dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dpe med pa ma yin la /
translated: As for the latter hypothesis, the fact that the cause, the milk, is not the cause of the curd, and that the cloth, etc., is not the effect of the milk, is itself the example that proves the thesis.

original: dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bcas pa khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: The reason is not unestablished. The thesis is not indeterminate, because it is qualified.

original: 'dir grangs can dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir grangs can dag gis smras pa /
translated: Here the SƒÅ·πÉkhya says:

original: 'bras bu snga na yod pa nyid kyis byed de /
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod pa nyid kyis byed de /
translated: The effect exists prior to the operation of the cause,

original: med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the case that the cause operates on what does not exist.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni byed pa med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni byed pa med de /
translated: Here, that which does not exist is not operated on by the cause,

original: dper na rus sbal gyi spu las gos byed pa med pa bzhin no //üîΩzho la ni byed pa yod pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na rus sbal gyi spu las gos byed pa med pa bzhin no // zho la ni byed pa yod pas de'i phyir /
translated: just as cloth is not operated on by the threads of a blanket.üîΩSince the curd is operated on,

original: 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: the effect exists prior to the operation of the cause.

original: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na dper na 'o ma la zho snga na med pa bzhin du rtsi rkyang la sogs pa dag kyang med par 'dra bas zho'i don du de'i rgyu 'o ma len par mi byed pa zhig na lan par yang byedüîΩpas de ltar rgyu len pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na dper na 'o ma la zho snga na med pa bzhin du rtsi rkyang la sogs pa dag kyang med par 'dra bas zho'i don du de'i rgyu 'o ma len par mi byed pa zhig na lan par yang byed pas de ltar rgyu len pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, one would not take milk as the cause for the sake of curd, but one does take it.

original: 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, because one takes the cause, the effect exists prior to the cause.

original: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na /
translated: If the effect did not exist prior to the cause,

original: dper na 'o ma la zho snga na med pa bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na 'o ma la zho snga na med pa bzhin du /
translated: then just as curd does not exist prior to milk,üîΩso too the three worlds would be similar to nonexistence.

original: 'jig rten gsum po dag kyang med par 'dra bas zho bzhin du 'jig rten gsum po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs @119b na de dag mi 'byung bas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po dag kyang med par 'dra bas zho bzhin du 'jig rten gsum po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs @119b na de dag mi 'byung bas /
translated: Therefore, just as curd, so too the three worlds would arise, but they do not arise.

original: de ltar thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: Thus, because everything would be nonexistent, the effect exists prior to the cause.

original: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na /
translated: If the effect did not exist prior to the cause,üîΩthen just as curd does not exist prior to milk,üîΩso too the three worlds would be similar to nonexistence.

original: ci'i phyir rdza mkhan gyi nus pas 'jim pa nus pa can dag kho na las bum pa sgrub par byed cing thams cad las mi byed pa nges pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rdza mkhan gyi nus pas 'jim pa nus pa can dag kho na las bum pa sgrub par byed cing thams cad las mi byed pa nges pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Why is it that the potter‚Äôs ability causes a vase to be produced only from clay that has the ability to produce a vase and not from everything else?

original: de ltar nus pas nus pa can byed pa'i phyir 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin par sems so //
analyzed: de ltar nus pas nus pa can byed pa'i phyir 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin par sems so //
translated: Since an ability produces something that has the ability, he thinks that the effect must exist prior to its cause.

original: 'dis kyang 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho nar mngon te /
analyzed: 'dis kyang 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho nar mngon te /
translated: This also shows that the effect must exist prior to its cause.

original: gang med pa la ni rgyu'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: gang med pa la ni rgyu'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: If something does not exist, it cannot have the nature of a cause.üîΩIf the effect did not exist prior to its cause, then the cause would not exist.

original: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na de la yang rgyu'i dngos po med par 'gyur ba zhig na de lta ma yin pas /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu snga na med par gyur na de la yang rgyu'i dngos po med par 'gyur ba zhig na de lta ma yin pas /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de ltar rgyu yod pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin na //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu yod pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin na //
translated: Therefore, because the cause exists, the effect must exist prior to its cause.

original: 'o ma la ni zho snga na yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'o ma la ni zho snga na yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Milk must exist prior to yogurt.

original: de yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because yogurt arises from it.

original: gang la gang snga na med pa de ni de yod kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la gang snga na med pa de ni de yod kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If something does not exist prior to something else, then it will not arise from it, even if it exists.

original: de la 'dir med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la 'dir med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de ni phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Here, the reason ‚Äúbecause it does not operate on what does not exist‚Äù is not established, because it is not a property of the subject.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dper rtag tu yang byed pa'i phyir zhes nye bar sbyor bas /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dper rtag tu yang byed pa'i phyir zhes nye bar sbyor bas /
translated: In the example of the dissimilar class, the application of ‚Äúbecause it always operates‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs mngon pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi phyogs la ni don ma grub pa nyid dang / don 'gal ba nyid de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mngon pa'i phyir tha snyad kyi phyogs la ni don ma grub pa nyid dang / don 'gal ba nyid de /
translated: is not established in the context of the thesis, because the reason is not evident.

original: yod pa la byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang / med pa la de srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa la byed pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang / med pa la de srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is contradictory, because operation is impossible for what exists and possible for what does not exist.

original: don dam par ni gtan tshigs dang dpe med do //
analyzed: don dam par ni gtan tshigs dang dpe med do //
translated: In the ultimate sense, there is no reason and no example.

original: gang la gang snga na yod pa de ni de las mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: gang la gang snga na yod pa de ni de las mi 'byung ste /
translated: Whatever exists prior to something else does not arise from it,

original: dper na rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do ;
analyzed: dper na rgyu'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do ;
translated: like the nature of the cause itself. Therefore, the thesis has the fault of the property of the subject being unestablished.

original: / ci ste yang 'di skad ces 'bras bu snga na med par smra ba rnams kyi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon gdags par 'dod pas med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag nye bar bzhag ste
analyzed: / ci ste yang 'di skad ces 'bras bu snga na med par smra ba rnams kyi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon gdags par 'dod pas med pa la mi byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag nye bar bzhag ste
translated: But if one says, ‚ÄúIn order to ascribe the fault of the distinction of the subject to the thesis of the non-existence of the effect prior to the cause, the statement ‚Äòbecause it does not occur in the non-existent‚Äô is presented,

original: / gang la gang snga na med pa de la ci byed pa la sogs pa med de /
analyzed: / gang la gang snga na med pa de la ci byed pa la sogs pa med de /
translated: and that which does not exist prior to something else does not have the activity of that,

original: dper na ri bong gi ra bzhin pas de'i phyir 'bras bu snga na med par smra ba rnams kyi 'bras bu snga na med pa nyid du dam bcas pa la yang byed pa la sogs pa bsal ba'i skyon yod do zhes zer na /
analyzed: dper na ri bong gi ra bzhin pas de'i phyir 'bras bu snga na med par smra ba rnams kyi 'bras bu snga na med pa nyid du dam bcas pa la yang byed pa la sogs pa bsal ba'i skyon yod do zhes zer na /
translated: like the horn of an ass. Therefore, the fault of the distinction of activity, etc., is ascribed to the thesis of the non-existence of the effect prior to the cause, ‚Äù

original: de ni mi gnod de /
analyzed: de ni mi gnod de /
translated: this is not a refutation,

original: legs par zin pa ma yin pa de gnyi ga yang bsal bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par zin pa ma yin pa de gnyi ga yang bsal bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are not well taken, since both are intended to be distinguished.

original: sgyu @120a * //
analyzed: sgyu @120a * //
translated: The illusion

original: ma'i skyes bu bzhin du yod pa dang med pa nyid du brjod par bya ma yin pa'i phyir bya ba byed pa la sogs pa dag tha snyad par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / don dam par rgyus 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa byed pa bsal ba'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: ma'i skyes bu bzhin du yod pa dang med pa nyid du brjod par bya ma yin pa'i phyir bya ba byed pa la sogs pa dag tha snyad par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / don dam par rgyus 'bras bu yod pa dang med pa byed pa bsal ba'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Because it is like the son of a barren woman, it is not to be said to exist or not to exist, and because activity, etc. are accepted conventionally, and because ultimately the existence or nonexistence of the effect produced by the cause is refuted, there is no fault.

original: thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir rgyu la 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir rgyu la 'bras bu snga na yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause everything is unproduced‚Äù is also a statement open to challenge here, because the effect must exist prior to the cause,

original: 'ga' zhig 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes nye bar sbyor bas gtan tshigs mngon pa'i phyir tha snyad du yang dpe med do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes nye bar sbyor bas gtan tshigs mngon pa'i phyir tha snyad du yang dpe med do //
translated: because something is produced. Since the reason is evident, there is no example even conventionally.

original: dam bcas pa la skyon yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bcas pa la skyon yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there a fault in the thesis,

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no pervasion.

original: 'dis rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi lan kyang btab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi lan kyang btab pa yin no //
translated: This also answers the reasonings such as ‚Äúbecause the cause is appropriated.‚Äù

original: mar me bum pa dmigs par bya ba'i phyir len pa de la yang de'i 'gal ba dmigs su med pas rang gi gtan tshigs rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: mar me bum pa dmigs par bya ba'i phyir len pa de la yang de'i 'gal ba dmigs su med pas rang gi gtan tshigs rgyu len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma nges pa nyid do //
translated: Also, in the case of taking a lamp or a pot as a referent object, since there is no observation of a contradiction with that, your reason, ‚Äúbecause of taking a cause,‚Äù is not established.

original: grangs can dag las gang dag rgyu la 'bras bu snga na yod pa yin mod kyi cha phra ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: grangs can dag las gang dag rgyu la 'bras bu snga na yod pa yin mod kyi cha phra ba'i phyir ram /
translated: Some SƒÅ·πÉkhyas say, ‚ÄúThe effect does exist prior to the cause, but because it is subtle,

original: zil gyis non pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhes zer ba de dag la yang rags pa nyid dang / zil gyis ma non pa nyid snga na med pa las phyis yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zil gyis non pa'i phyir mi dmigs so zhes zer ba de dag la yang rags pa nyid dang / zil gyis ma non pa nyid snga na med pa las phyis yod pa'i phyir /
translated: it is not observed.‚Äù For them, since coarseness and non-subjugation exist later, after the prior nonexistence,

original: 'bras bu snga na yod pa ma yin pas phyogs snga ma la gnod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod pa ma yin pas phyogs snga ma la gnod do //
translated: the effect does not exist prior to the cause, and therefore the prior position is undermined.

original: cha phra ba yod pas bsams pa gang yin pa de rags par mthong ngo zhes zer ba dag gi dam bcas pa la yang rags pa nyid du yod pa rjes su dpog pas cha phra ba nyid bsal ba'i phyir chos kyi ngo bo nyid las log pa'i skyon
analyzed: cha phra ba yod pas bsams pa gang yin pa de rags par mthong ngo zhes zer ba dag gi dam bcas pa la yang rags pa nyid du yod pa rjes su dpog pas cha phra ba nyid bsal ba'i phyir chos kyi ngo bo nyid las log pa'i skyon
translated: Some say, ‚ÄúThe effect that is thought to exist is seen as coarse because of the existence of subtlety.‚Äù For them, since coarseness is inferred to exist, subtlety is refuted. Therefore, the error of the intrinsic reality of phenomena is

original: yod do // bye brag tu smra ba dag gi dam bcas pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar yin pas /
analyzed: yod do // bye brag tu smra ba dag gi dam bcas pa'i phyogs la yang yod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar yin pas /
translated: Yes, it does.üîΩAnd the fault of the subject being unestablished also occurs in the thesis of the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas, because that which exists in the present is inferred to exist in the present.

original: da ltar nyid yod par rjes su dpog pas 'bras bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa nyid kyi khyad par bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: da ltar nyid yod par rjes su dpog pas 'bras bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa nyid kyi khyad par bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: The fault of the subject being unestablished also occurs in the thesis of the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas, because that which exists in the present is inferred to exist in the present.

original: gang dag rgyu ni 'bras bu byed pa nyid ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang dag rgyu ni 'bras bu byed pa nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: Those who say that the cause does not produce the effect,

original: 'di ltar gsal bar byed do zhes zer ba de dag la yang 'di skad ces gang gis ji zhig bzhin du gsal bar byed ces brgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal bar byed do zhes zer ba de dag la yang 'di skad ces gang gis ji zhig bzhin du gsal bar byed ces brgal zhing brtag par bya'o //
translated: but rather reveals it, should be asked, ‚ÄúWhat is revealed by what?‚Äù

original: gal te mar mes bum pa yod par gyur pa gsal bar byed pa bzhin du'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mar mes bum pa yod par gyur pa gsal bar byed pa bzhin du'o zhe na /
translated: If they say, ‚ÄúThe effect is revealed by the cause, just as a pot is revealed by a lamp,‚ÄùüîΩthe reply is given in the chapter on nonarising: ‚ÄúA lamp does not reveal a pot ultimately,

original: phyogs de'i @120b lan ni skye ba med pa'i rab tu byed par don dam par mar me ni bum pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs de'i @120b lan ni skye ba med pa'i rab tu byed par don dam par mar me ni bum pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: because a lamp does not reveal a pot ultimately.

original: mig gi yul yin pa'i phyir dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / gzugs can yin pa'i phyir dang / reg pa yin pa'i phyir dang / brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi phyir dper na bong ba bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa dag gis lan btab zin to //
analyzed: mig gi yul yin pa'i phyir dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / gzugs can yin pa'i phyir dang / reg pa yin pa'i phyir dang / brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi phyir dper na bong ba bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa dag gis lan btab zin to //
translated: The response to this is already known from the following inferences: because it is the object of the eye, because it possesses obstruction, because it is physical, because it is contact, because it is expressible, like a clod.

original: grangs can dag las gang dag mkhas par rlom pa dag gis 'di skad ces zer te /
analyzed: grangs can dag las gang dag mkhas par rlom pa dag gis 'di skad ces zer te /
translated: Some SƒÅ·πÉkhyas who are conceited about their knowledge say this:

original: 'bras bu ma skyes pa dang / zhig pa dag kyang nus pa'i bdag nyid du yod pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu ma skyes pa dang / zhig pa dag kyang nus pa'i bdag nyid du yod pas de'i phyir /
translated: Because the effect that has not yet arisen and the effect that has disintegrated exist in the nature of potency,

original: 'bras bu snga na yod pa zhes bya'i /
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na yod pa zhes bya'i /
translated: therefore it is said that the effect exists prior to its production.

original: gsal ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba'i bdag nyid du yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it does not exist in the nature of manifestation.

original: rgyus 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba yang byed do zhes bya ba la don du ma yod pa'i phyir sgra de'i don ni rgyu 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba yin par rnam par bshad do //
analyzed: rgyus 'bras bu byed do zhes bya ba yang byed do zhes bya ba la don du ma yod pa'i phyir sgra de'i don ni rgyu 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba yin par rnam par bshad do //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe cause produces the effect‚Äù is explained as follows: the word ‚Äúproduces‚Äù has many meanings; the meaning of the word ‚Äúproduces‚Äù in the statement ‚Äúthe cause produces the effect‚Äù is that the cause becomes the intrinsic reality of the effect.

original: ci ste 'bras bu ma skyes pa dang zhig pa dag yod par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'bras bu ma skyes pa dang zhig pa dag yod par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: If the effect does not yet exist, how can it be said that it exists in the future and that it existed in the past?

original: 'bras bu snga na med pa dang / zhig nas med pa dag ni yod pa kho nar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu snga na med pa dang / zhig nas med pa dag ni yod pa kho nar shes par bya ste /
translated: The effect that does not yet exist and the effect that has ceased both exist.

original: dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir dang / 'i zhes bstan pa'i phyir dper na da ltar gyi 'bras bu bzhin no //
analyzed: dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir dang / 'i zhes bstan pa'i phyir dper na da ltar gyi 'bras bu bzhin no //
translated: This is because they are included in time and because they are indicated by the words ‚Äúin the future‚Äù and ‚Äúin the past,‚Äù just like the present effect.

original: gal te 'bras bu skye ba'i dus na rgyu ji ltar ma zhig ce na /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu skye ba'i dus na rgyu ji ltar ma zhig ce na /
translated: If the effect is produced, how can the cause be said to be non-ceased?

original: rgyu ni 'bras bu skye ba'i dus nam zhig pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ni 'bras bu skye ba'i dus nam zhig pa kho na yin te /
translated: The cause is non-ceased at the time the effect is produced.

original: nges par skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: nges par skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: This is because it definitely produces the effect, just like the intrinsic reality of the effect.

original: de bzhin du shes pa log pa dang / ma log pa dang / the tshom can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi don nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du shes pa log pa dang / ma log pa dang / the tshom can gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi don nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa yod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gis rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it should be understood by the reasonings such as: ‚ÄúBecause it is the cause of the consciousness that is reversed, not reversed, and doubtful, and because it is the object of another, and because consciousness does not really exist.‚Äù

original: yang na rgyu 'o ma zhes bya ba'i skad cig ma las 'bras bu zho zhes bya ba'i skad cig ma gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na rgyu 'o ma zhes bya ba'i skad cig ma las 'bras bu zho zhes bya ba'i skad cig ma gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Again, the effect, the moment of curd, is not different from the cause, the moment of milk.

original: ba las byung ba'i phyir dper na zho'i bdag nyid bzhin no //üîΩyang na 'das pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma las /
analyzed: ba las byung ba'i phyir dper na zho'i bdag nyid bzhin no // yang na 'das pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma las /
translated: Because it arises from milk, like the essence of curd.

original: da ltar gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Again, the present moment of eye consciousness is not different from the past moment of eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir da ltar gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhin no //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir da ltar gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhin no //
translated: Because it is eye consciousness, like the present moment of eye consciousness.

original: gal te rgyud tha dad pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag @121a * //
analyzed: gal te rgyud tha dad pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag @121a * //
translated: If the eye consciousness and so on of different mindstreamsüîΩ

original: gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the eye consciousness, etc., of different continua are not ascertained,

original: de dag kyang phyogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: de dag kyang phyogs kyi khongs su gtogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: then they are included in the position, and so there is no error.

original: 'dir yang 'das pa'i rgyu phyogs su byed na ni gzhi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: 'dir yang 'das pa'i rgyu phyogs su byed na ni gzhi ma grub pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod do //
translated: If you make the past the position, then there is the error of the unestablished basis, etc.

original: da ltar gyi phyogs su byed na ni dpe med de /
analyzed: da ltar gyi phyogs su byed na ni dpe med de /
translated: If you make the present the position, then there is no example,

original: de'i 'bras bu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its effect is not established.

original: 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan ma yin pa gang yin pa de yang de'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a different effect is not its cause,

original: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /üîΩrang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i dam bcas pa la rgyu rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir / rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i dam bcas pa la rgyu rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyis /
translated: because it is not different.

original: de'i rgyu nyid btsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: de'i rgyu nyid btsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: Since it is not different, like itself, the proposition that it is inferred to be not different has the error of the refutation of the nature of the subject, because the cause is sought as not a cause.

original: ma zhig pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang gang yin /
analyzed: ma zhig pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang gang yin /
translated: What is the meaning of ‚Äúnot destroyed‚Äù?

original: gal te rang bzhin gyis bag la zha ba'o zhe na ni dpe med do //
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin gyis bag la zha ba'o zhe na ni dpe med do //
translated: If you say that it is naturally latent, then there is no example.

original: gal te mi gsal ba'o zhe na yang skyon de nyid do //
analyzed: gal te mi gsal ba'o zhe na yang skyon de nyid do //
translated: If you say that it is not manifest, then the same error arises.

original: zhig pa dag dang snga na med pa dag yod par rtog pa la ni dpe med pa dang khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhig pa dag dang snga na med pa dag yod par rtog pa la ni dpe med pa dang khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of the concepts of destruction and prior nonexistence, there is no example, and the thesis is contradicted.

original: gal te da ltar yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te da ltar yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is present,

original: da ltar nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i dam bcas pa la rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: da ltar nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i dam bcas pa la rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyis rgyu nyid bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: then the error arises that the nature of the subject is contradicted, because the thesis is inferred in the present, and the cause is excluded by the absence of a cause.

original: da ltar gyi 'bras bu yang rdzas su yod pa nyid du mi 'grub ste ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ltar gyi 'bras bu yang rdzas su yod pa nyid du mi 'grub ste ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the present effect is not established as substantially existent, because it is not produced.

original: de yod pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med do //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med do //
translated: And because its existence is not established, there is no example.

original: 'dis dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs gnyis la yang skyon gyis lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs gnyis la yang skyon gyis lan btab pa yin no //
translated: This also refutes the two reasons, ‚Äúbecause it is included in time,‚Äù and so on.

original: de bzhin du gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: So too, the same can be said with respect to the position of difference.

original: de ltar re zhig rgyu yin par gyur pas 'bras bu yin par gyur pa mi byed par bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rgyu yin par gyur pas 'bras bu yin par gyur pa mi byed par bstan to //
translated: Thus it has been demonstrated that a real cause does not produce a real effect.

original: da ni tha snyad du yang rgyu ma yin par gyur pas 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa mi byed de /
analyzed: da ni tha snyad du yang rgyu ma yin par gyur pas 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa mi byed de /
translated: Now, even conventionally, an unreal cause does not produce an unreal effect,

original: med pa'i phyir dper na rus sbal gyi spu dag de'i gos mi byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir dper na rus sbal gyi spu dag de'i gos mi byed pa bzhin no //
translated: because it does not exist, just as, for example, the hair of a turtle does not produce a cloth.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu la yang rgyu ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin no zhes dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu la yang rgyu ma yin par gyur pa'i bya ba ma yin no zhes dam bcas pa la khyad par yod par zad kyi /
translated: So too, with respect to an effect, an unreal cause does not perform an action.

original: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yan lag lhag ma dag ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The remainder of the members of the syllogism are as before.

original: rnam pa gnyis su smra ba dag gi phyogs la yang gnyi ga'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su smra ba dag gi phyogs la yang gnyi ga'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even in the system of the proponents of the two kinds of negation, both errors would apply.

original: rang gi sde pa bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: rang gi sde pa bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
translated: The VaibhƒÅ·π£ika, a Buddhist essentialist, says:

original: rgyu yin par gyur pa 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa byed do //
analyzed: rgyu yin par gyur pa 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa byed do //
translated: A real cause produces an unreal effect.

original: 'bras bu ma @121b skyes pa ni ma yin par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ma @121b skyes pa ni ma yin par gyur pa ste /
translated: An unarisen effect is non-existent,

original: gzung du med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //üîΩskyes pa la ni rgyu'i nus pa nyid med kyi /
analyzed: gzung du med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no // skyes pa la ni rgyu'i nus pa nyid med kyi /
translated: like a sky flower, because it is not apprehended.üîΩA cause has no power with regard to an arisen effect,

original: ma skyes pa la de yod pas 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa nyid do //üîΩci ste med par 'dra ba las ri bong gi rva ni mi skye la /
analyzed: ma skyes pa la de yod pas 'bras bu ma yin par gyur pa nyid do // ci ste med par 'dra ba las ri bong gi rva ni mi skye la /
translated: but it does have power with regard to a non-arisen effect.

original: 'bras bu ni skye bar 'gyur ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni skye bar 'gyur ba la khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between the non-existence of a rabbit‚Äôs horns and the non-existence of an effect?

original: ri bong gi rva ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye la /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye la /
translated: A rabbit‚Äôs horns do not arise because they have no cause.

original: 'bras bu ni da lta ma yin pas de ltar rgyu yod pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa skye'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni da lta ma yin pas de ltar rgyu yod pa'i phyir 'bras bu med pa skye'o //
translated: An effect arises because it has a cause.

original: yang na 'bras bu med pa nyid ni skye'i /
analyzed: yang na 'bras bu med pa nyid ni skye'i /
translated: Or, an effect that is non-existent arises,üîΩbut an effect that is not non-existent does not arise.

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni mi skye bas gang skye ba de ni med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni mi skye bas gang skye ba de ni med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be ascertained that what arises is non-existent.

original: de'i phyir gang dag na re med pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag na re med pa ni /
translated: Therefore, those who say that an effect arises from a cause that is non-existent

original: mi skye ste med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no zhes zer ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: mi skye ste med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no zhes zer ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: But it does not arise because it does not exist, like the horn of an ass.üîΩThis is a proof of what has already been established.

original: dpe yang med de 'bras bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs nam mkha'i me tog la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe yang med de 'bras bu nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs nam mkha'i me tog la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no example, because the effect itself does not exist. The reason ‚Äúbecause it does not exist‚Äù does not apply to a sky flower.

original: yang na skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs yongs su 'dzin na ni dpe med de /
analyzed: yang na skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs yongs su 'dzin na ni dpe med de /
translated: Or, if you accept the reason ‚Äúbecause it does not exist prior to arising,‚Äù there is no example.

original: ri bong gi rva la de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that does not exist in the horn of an ass.

original: gtan pa med pa gtan tshigs su brjod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gtan pa med pa gtan tshigs su brjod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: If you state a reason that is not established, the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: snam bu snga na med pa nyid skye bar mthong ste /
analyzed: snam bu snga na med pa nyid skye bar mthong ste /
translated: You see that a cloth that did not exist previously arises.

original: mthong ba las lhag pa'i tshad ma gzhan med pas des na 'bras bu snga na med pa yin no zhes zer ro /üîΩ// / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: mthong ba las lhag pa'i tshad ma gzhan med pas des na 'bras bu snga na med pa yin no zhes zer ro / // / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma bam po brgyad pa /
translated: Since there is no valid cognition other than seeing, therefore the effect does not exist prior to its cause.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: khyed cag gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod pa gzung du med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i don gang yin /
analyzed: khyed cag gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod pa gzung du med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de'i don gang yin /
translated: What is the meaning of your reason, ‚Äúbecause it is not apprehended‚Äù?

original: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma thams cad kyis gzung du med pa'i phyir zhes bya bar rtog na ni /
analyzed: mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pa dang / tshad ma thams cad kyis gzung du med pa'i phyir zhes bya bar rtog na ni /
translated: If you think it means ‚Äúbecause it is not apprehended by any valid cognition, such as perception or inference,‚Äù

original: rnam pa thams cad du gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / gtan tshigs kyi don ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon yod pas rjes su dpag pa des 'bras bu ma skyes pa ni ma yin par gyur pa ste zhes bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / gtan tshigs kyi don ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon yod pas rjes su dpag pa des 'bras bu ma skyes pa ni ma yin par gyur pa ste zhes bstan par mi nus so //
translated: then the fault of the meaning of the reason being unestablished and the meaning of the reason being indefinite would be present in every way, and therefore it would be impossible to demonstrate the consequence that ‚Äúthe non-arisen effect is not arisen‚Äù by that inference.

original: 'bras bu med pa nyid ni skye'i /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa nyid ni skye'i /
translated: An effect that does not exist arises.

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni mi skye bas /
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa ni mi skye bas /
translated: An effect that does not exist does not arise.

original: gang skye ba de ni med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa /
analyzed: gang skye ba de ni med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung bar bya'o zhes gang smras pa /
translated: Therefore, it should be ascertained that whatever arises does not exist.

original: de la yang 'bras bu med pa mi skye bar bstan zin pa'i phyir dang / med pa'i phyir zhes @122a * //
analyzed: de la yang 'bras bu med pa mi skye bar bstan zin pa'i phyir dang / med pa'i phyir zhes @122a * //
translated: In response to that, since it has already been demonstrated that an effect that does not exist does not arise, and because it does not exist, the meaning of the reason is unestablished.

original: bya ba'i gtan tshigs spyir sbyar ba'i phyir dang / de'i dpe yang de bzhin du grub pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: bya ba'i gtan tshigs spyir sbyar ba'i phyir dang / de'i dpe yang de bzhin du grub pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
translated: And it is not a proof of what is already established, because the reason is applied generally, and because the example is established in the same way.

original: dpe med pa dang gtan tshigs med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dpe med pa dang gtan tshigs med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not without an example or without a reason.

original: gzhan yang don dam par 'bras bu zho zhes bya ba ni 'o ma las mi 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang don dam par 'bras bu zho zhes bya ba ni 'o ma las mi 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, it should be understood that ultimately the so-called effect, yogurt, does not arise from milk,

original: rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na bum pa skye ba mi rigs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir dper na bum pa skye ba mi rigs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it depends on a cause, just as, for example, the production of a pot is unreasonable.

original: de skye ba ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de skye ba ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its production would be pointless.

original: yang na don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i zho ni smra bar 'dod pa'i 'o ma'i rgyun can ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i zho ni smra bar 'dod pa'i 'o ma'i rgyun can ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: Or, it should be understood that ultimately the yogurt that is desired to be the object of expression is not the continuum of the milk that is desired to be the object of expression,

original: zho yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zho yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is yogurt, like something else.

original: de bzhin du byas pa nyid dang / chud za ba nyid dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad pa nyid dang / rgyu dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o //üîΩmed par 'dra ba las 'bras bu ni rgyu yod pa'i phyir skye la /
analyzed: de bzhin du byas pa nyid dang / chud za ba nyid dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad pa nyid dang / rgyu dang ldan pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o // med par 'dra ba las 'bras bu ni rgyu yod pa'i phyir skye la /
translated: Likewise, the reasons ‚Äúbecause of being produced,‚Äù ‚Äúbecause of being perishable,‚Äù ‚Äúbecause of being different due to the differentiation of conditions,‚Äù ‚Äúbecause of possessing a cause,‚Äù and so on should be extensively stated.

original: ri bong gi rva ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye'o zhes gang smras pa de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: You may say, ‚ÄúAn effect arises because of the existence of a cause, but the horn of a rabbit does not arise because of the absence of a cause.‚Äù

original: don dam par gang gi rgyur gang 'dod de ni de'i rgyu ma yin par shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: don dam par gang gi rgyur gang 'dod de ni de'i rgyu ma yin par shes par byar nus te /
translated: That is not good because it is not possible to know that which is asserted to be the cause of something ultimately is its cause.

original: skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not exist prior to arising,

original: dper na ri bong gi rva'am /
analyzed: dper na ri bong gi rva'am /
translated: like the horn of a rabbit,

original: de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: or like something other than that.

original: gzhan yang gang gi tshe 'di skad ces skye ba'i snga rol na med pa gang yin pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro zhes dam bcas pa khyad par can byas pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gi tshe 'di skad ces skye ba'i snga rol na med pa gang yin pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro zhes dam bcas pa khyad par can byas pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni /
translated: Moreover, when you assert, ‚ÄúThat which does not exist prior to arising arises,‚Äù because you make a special promise, the effect

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin du skye bar mi 'thad pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes dam 'cha' bar byed pa de'i tshe na yang /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin du skye bar mi 'thad pa dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes dam 'cha' bar byed pa de'i tshe na yang /
translated: It is not tenable that it arises, like the horn of a rabbit, and so on.

original: rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis de bsal ba'i phyir de ni gyi na zer ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis de bsal ba'i phyir de ni gyi na zer ba yin no //
translated: But when that is the case, then because it is refuted by the very inference that was taught, it is said that it is nonsense.

original: don dam par zho ni 'o ma las mi 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: don dam par zho ni 'o ma las mi 'byung bar shes par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that ultimately curd does not arise from milk.

original: skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin pas /
analyzed: skye ba'i snga rol na med pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin pas /
translated: Because it does not exist prior to arising, like something else.

original: de'i phyir de ni bdag nyid dbugs 'byin par byed pa tsam du zad do //üîΩ'di skad ces snga na med pa nyid skye bar mthong ste zhes gang smras pa de nyid kyang ci yang dag par yod pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni bdag nyid dbugs 'byin par byed pa tsam du zad do // 'di skad ces snga na med pa nyid skye bar mthong ste zhes gang smras pa de nyid kyang ci yang dag par yod pa'am /
translated: Therefore, it is merely his own sigh of relief.üîΩIn this regard, it was said, ‚ÄúNonexistence prior to arising is seen.‚ÄùüîΩBut when it is analyzed, does it arise as something real, unreal, or both?

original: med pa'am / yod med cig skye bar 'gyur zhes brtags na de dag rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad do //
analyzed: med pa'am / yod med cig skye bar 'gyur zhes brtags na de dag rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad do //
translated: All of these are completely untenable.

original: de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni bum pa la sogs pa dag gi skye ba ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i skye ba bzhin du tha snyad pa @122b yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams kyis ni bum pa la sogs pa dag gi skye ba ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i skye ba bzhin du tha snyad pa @122b yin gyi /
